titles.title: A bill to increase economic benefits to the United States from the activities of cruise ships visiting Alaska.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8491-8492)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Prescribes guidelines under which passengers may be transported in foreign-flag cruise vessels between ports in Alaska and between ports in Alaska and other U.S. ports.
